idea:
Daddys Infra is a real estate company in India for residential and commercial property across India. We provide services tailored to every individual need. Our success seal lies in the unity of strength, fostered trust, and continuous customer support that provides us with fuel to grow and build a bright future.

Daddys Infra has been in business for over 8 years and we have seen the real estate market dynamics change from it just being an investment to a value-driven investment. Anchoring on the bond of trust and efficiency, Daddys Infra has seen maximum growth in its business thanks to its motive of being customer-friendly.
name: daddysinfra.pvt.ltd

idea:
Rolling Banners is building a vendor management platform for retail development i.e. R-Dash. 

In absence of a right vendor management tool to manage multiple suppliers, businesses turn to contractors/agencies to develop their retail stores. We are replacing these middlemen with R-Dash which brings in speed and upto 30% cost savings advantage in overall retail development spend. We have set-up a centralised control tower for offering vendor selection, contracting, and work distribution support. Managed-services offering provides enterprises a risk-proof transition from their existing agency relationships to an agile and cost-effective solution.
name: VONKEN BRANDTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Wachsen Technologies is a startup idea to provide solutions to the engineering skilled freshers to acquire relevant skills so that they can secure a job in IT sector. We are providing a platform to register engineering graduates. We will be helping them to prepare for placements in different organizations. Also we will provide platform to different companies to register and tap the talent.
name: Wachsen Technologies

idea: We innovate and develop automated and wearable medical devices for tracking and managing circulatory health issues.
name: BIOASSISTANT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Mesh is a networking platform for the creators and talented artist around the world to Explore, Showcase , Share, Learn & Compete on a community platform. It is specially developed for the artist and creators to help them find the correct opportunity and exposure .

The app will offer a platform where creators can network, like, share and collaborate on projects within a social networking setting. The overall goal is to help newcomers gain exposure for their work while connecting them with others who can provide guidance as they continue their careers.
name: MESH NETWORKS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Sprint Tech Solutions Private Limited incorporate by a team of IT Professionals who had a common vision of bringing Information technology advantages across various industry levels.

                                                 Continuously evolving and adapting itself to provide Clients with solutions towards Operational efficiency along with significant cost benefits.

                                               We provide IT Infrastructure integration and technology process solutions on a pan-India basis. Our diverse range of Products and Services makes us a preferred one-stop solution provider for end-to-end IT Infrastructure setups
name: SPRINT TECH SOLUTIONS LIMITED

idea:
Oranje Kracht Energy (OKE) is a company innovating in the new age last-mile energy/electricity availability. The last mile electricity availability is the key to building a sustainable energy supply chain enabling the mass-scale deployment of renewable and emission reduction measures. We are green energy producer striving to make a meaningful contribution towards building a sustainable future for generations to come.


We are committed to leading India’s transition away from fossil fuels and meeting the rising demand for energy in a sustainable manner by delivering cleaner and smarter energy choices; thereby reducing India’s carbon footprint.
name: ORANJE KRACHT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Myriad Softcorp providing in-depth customized IT Infrastructure Solutions to across all sectors of industry – government, healthcare, banking, telecom, insurance, retail and manufacturing. We power your business with IT Service management and consulting services to help it stay relevant, flexible, and competitive, while boosting performance and productivity with our unique IT infrastructure solutions. Our IT solutions follow an end-to-end approach, which enable us to deliver unified management of infrastructure and applications, getting your business ready for its transformational journey.
name: MYRIAD SOFTCORP PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: At ARICO, we are constantly looking for better ways to protect your ships, off-shore installations and equipment.
name: ARICO MARINE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Tantragyan Technologies Pvt Ltd is a Sales & Marketing technology company with the mission of empowering businesses with appropriate technology tools.


We believe businesses always grow by continuously acquiring and retaining customers by building long-lasting relations with the customers. And to achieve that, we are building an ecosystem for companies with a future of technologies and education.


edge CRM is our product brand! It's an AI-driven SaaS platform for Small, Medium Enterprises. Product is providing tremendous value to businesses to acquire and retain more customers.
name: TANTRAGYAN TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
